title: casperBGD
author: casperBGD
content: Since we have questions from Women Football in our BSFL league, I would open a topic about World Cup for discussion, if there is interestBasically, competition system is same as in Men football, eight groups, each with four teams, playing one game with each-other, so three rounds in group stage, top two teams are going into next phasemain competition favorites are USA and England, USA won two last competitions in a row, and Lionesses are European championsTournament will be played in Australia and New Zealand, four groups in each country, first opening match is on Thursday between between New Zealand and Norway, that will be played in Auckland/New Zealand, finals will be played in Sydney/Australia on 20 August

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: For many persons, the USA women seems to be the favourite in winning this year women's world cup over again. But I doubt if the USA women team will be able to defend and retain the title . I look forward to see astonishing results as they unfold in this year 2023 FIFA WWC. My favourite are the Nigerian women's team, even though I don't see them winning the cup am convince they will surpass the roundup sixteen stage. Cheers.

comments.author: Woodie
